mapper.update: update board_reply set br_delete=1 where br_num=#{br_num}
update board_reply set br_content=#{br_content},br_regdate=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') where br_num=#{br_num}
mapper.select: select * from( select bb.*,rownum rnum from(select br.*,m.id,aa.brucnt,rownum r1 from board_reply br,member m, (select br.br_num, count(bru.br_num) brucnt from board_reply br, board_reply_up bru where br.br_num=bru.br_num(+) and br.br_delete=0 and br.b_num=#{b_num} group by br.br_num) aa where br.br_num=aa.br_num and br.m_num=m.m_num order by br.br_num desc)bb) where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
select NVL(count(br_num),0) cnt from board_reply where b_num=#{b_num} and br_delete=0
